sentences.english: I sat down at the piano and launched into Bach's Toccata in C major.
sentences.chinese: 我在钢琴前坐了下来，开始弹奏巴赫的托卡塔C大调。

sentences.english: I've finished my Toccata but I have no fugue .
sentences.chinese: 我完成了我的托卡塔但是我没有赋格。

sentences.english: What can I fit?What'd fit after that great Toccata?
sentences.chinese: 在最伟大的托卡塔之后，还能写什么？

sentences.english: What'd fit after that great Toccata?
sentences.chinese: 什么才适合那伟大的托卡塔？

definition: sonata form (one of the large-scale structures used in Western classical music)
Handel (name)/George Frideric Handel (1685-1759), German-born Baroque composer, naturalized British in 1727
